name: AzureStaticWebApp
description: [PREVIEW] Build and deploy an Azure Static Web App
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: [Learn more about Azure Static Web Apps](https://aka.ms/swadocs)

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the absolute working directory in which to execute this task. If left empty, the default working directory will be used.

inputs.name: app_location
inputs.label: App location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory location of the application source code relative to working directory

inputs.name: app_build_command
inputs.label: App build command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom command for Oryx to run when building application source code

inputs.name: output_location
inputs.label: Output location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory location of the compiled application code after building

inputs.name: api_location
inputs.label: Api location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory location of the Azure Functions source code relative to working directory

inputs.name: api_build_command
inputs.label: Api build command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom command for Oryx to run when building Azure Functions source code

inputs.name: routes_location
inputs.label: Routes location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory location where the routes.json file can be found, relative to working directory. Note: routes.json is deprecated, use staticwebapp.config.json

inputs.name: config_file_location
inputs.label: Config file location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory location where the staticwebapp.config.json file can be found, relative to working directory

inputs.name: skip_app_build
inputs.label: Skip app build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skips Oryx build for app folder

inputs.name: skip_api_build
inputs.label: Skip api build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skips Oryx build for api folder

inputs.name: is_static_export
inputs.label: Set static export
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set this flag to true when your application is configured to export to static HTML, i.e. when if you're using `next export`.

inputs.name: build_timeout_in_minutes
inputs.label: Build timeout in minutes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Time limit of Oryx app folder build in minutes

inputs.name: azure_static_web_apps_api_token
inputs.label: Azure Static Web Apps api token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Api token for deployment. Not required if passed as an environment variable

inputs.name: deployment_environment
inputs.label: Deployment Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment to deploy to. Leave blank for production environment. Takes precedence over Production Branch

inputs.name: production_branch
inputs.label: Production Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Production branch. When specified and Deployment Environment is empty, deployments from other branches will be preview environments

inputs.name: data_api_location
inputs.label: Data api location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory location of the Data API source files relative to working directory
